p: The CAN framework suggests 7 interdependent key categories of needs (theoretical codes), 17 sub-categories (axial codes), and 55 factors of need (initial and in vivo codes). An overview of the 7 interdependent key categories with their sub-categories is provided in Figure 2. The description of the retrieved sub-categories of needs starts from Section 3.1.1 Finance (N1.1).
